DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study design intervention increase hepatitis B ( HBV ) screening among Hmong Americans .
DOC.brief_title: Community-based Hepatitis B Interventions Hmong Adults
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator design intervention measure baseline proportion Hmong adult ( age 18-64 ) serologically test Hepatitis B . Investigators work lay health worker promote serologically test Hepatitis B increase knowledge Hepatitis B among Hmong adult . The effectiveness lay health worker intervention evaluate conduct randomize , control trial among Hmong adult age 18-64 previously test hepatitis B . The primary hypothesis proportion Hmong adult , age 18-64 reporting serologically test Hepatitis B post-test significantly great intervention group control group . Secondary hypothesis : There great increase knowledge Hepatitis B liver cancer intervention group control group . Participants great knowledge hepatitis B liver cancer post-test likely serologically test hepatitis B .
DOC.criteria: Ages 1864 year Hmong ancestry Never test Hepatitis B Children age 18 year Adults age 64 year NonHmong ancestry Previous test Hepatitis B
